name: Rotational Ruckus: The Knights' Clash
description:
<+>-A quick, little prototype that originated of a sudden idea that "popped" to me. I hope that it serves as a fun "game" or, possibly even better, an inspiration for someone.

-Controls:

  • The Red Knight:
ARROW KEYS - movementPERIOD - jumpCOMMA - rotate the sword leftMINUS - rotate the sword right
  • The Blue Knight:
WASD - movementSPACE - jumpV - rotate the sword leftB- rotate the sword right
  • Z - reset.
*Psst. The title and the cover image have been AI generated.. Don't tell anyone..*
